title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Social Justice Implementation Through Instructional Design—A Duo-Ethnographic Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze social inequality cases through collaborative dialogue with peers using the duo-ethnography methodology.
Learners can design two assessment tools reflecting social justice principles during the instructional design process.
Learners can identify language-related bias cases in their specialized fields (medical/legal/technical) and propose alternative solutions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
